description: Can’t decide? Our sushi sets offer you the best of Japanese cuisine in one package! A combination of fresh nigiri, maki, sashimi, and other delicacies will delight every sushi lover. Choose your favorite set and enjoy the perfect harmony of flavors!

items.name: Big One (2kg)
items.description:
• Avocado Maki
• Baked Roll with Chicken
• Philadelphia with XXL Salmon
• California with Shrimp
• Cheese Roll
• Philadelphia De Luxe
• Tempura Roll with Eel

items.description:
• Philadelphia with Salmon
• Philadelphia with Tuna
• Philadelphia with XXL Salmon
• Philadelphia Mango

items.name: Set for Two (700g)
items.description:
• Philadelphia with Salmon
• Baked Roll with Chicken
• Cheese Roll

items.name: Vegan Set (800g)
